<script type='text/javascript'>
            function OnClientCommandExecuted(editor,commandName,tool)
            {
                if(commandName=='ToggleScreenMode' || commandName._commandName == 'ToggleScreenMode' )
                {
            
TogglePageControlsBar();
}
            }

            function TogglePageControlsBar( menuIDList )
            {
                if(typeof menuIDList != 'undefined' || menuIDList != null)
                {
                    var menuList = menuIDList.split(',');
                    for( var i=0; i<menuList.length; i++ )
                    {
                        var el = document.getElementByID(menuList[i]);

                        if( el != undefined )
                        {
                            if( el.style.visibility!='hidden' )
                                el.style.visibility ='hidden';
                            else 
                                el.style.visibility = 'visible';
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
</script>

$(document).ready(function() {
 
    var imageHeight, wrapperHeight, overlap, container = $('.slides .image');  
 
    function centerImage() {
        imageHeight = container.find('img').height();
        wrapperHeight = container.height();
        overlap = (wrapperHeight - imageHeight) / 2;
        container.find('img').css('margin-top', overlap);
    }
     
    $(window).on("load resize", centerImage);
      
});

$('a.flex-pause1').click(function(e){
    e.preventDefault();
    var thisBtn = $(this);
    if ( thisBtn.text() == 'Pause' ){
        thisBtn.text('Play');
        thisBtn.toggleClass('fa-play fa-pause');
        $('.flexslider').flexslider('pause');
    } else {
    if ( thisBtn.text() == 'Play' ){
        thisBtn.text('Pause');
        thisBtn.toggleClass('fa-play fa-pause');
        $('.flexslider').flexslider('play');
    }
    }
});

});

$(window).load(function(){
      $(function(){
		var $lists = $('.megamenu .second-level-list > li'),
			years = [];
		
		$lists.each(function() {
			var year = this.getAttribute('data-cat');
			if ( ! ~$.inArray(year, years) ) {
				years.push(year);
			}
		});
		
		$.each(years, function (i, year) {
			$lists.filter('[data-cat="' + year + '"]').wrapAll('<li class="class-cat"></li>');
			$lists.filter('[data-cat="' + year + '"]').eq(0).before('<h2 class="cat-title">'+ year +'</h2>');
		});

		$('.class-cat').each(function(){
			$(this).find('li.level2').wrapAll('<ul></ul>');
		});

		$('.megamenu .second-level-list').each(function(){
			var lis = $(this).find(".class-cat");
			for(var i = 0; i < lis.length; i+=4) {
			  lis.slice(i, i+4)
				 .wrapAll('<li class="menuCol"><ul></ul></li>');
			}
		});

	});
});


</script><!-- END OF MEGAMENU SCRIPT --><script>
